p: While a plethora of studies suggest protection after recovery from COVID-19, there are no reports on protection of recovered humans against re-infection ( 14, 15). This report aims to document the apparent protection of a recovered COVID-19 patient from re-infection. This is of global interest to the health authorities, who are seeking evidence for protection of recovered individuals against reinfection, in the hope of decreasing the current enormous COVID-19 burden worldwide.
